name: HTMLMediaElement.error
description: The HTMLMediaElement.error is the MediaError object for the most recent error, or null if there has not been an error. When an error event is received by the element, you can determine details about what happened by examining this object.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLMediaElement.error' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLMediaElement.error' in the 'HTML5' specification.
